name: Thousands
description:
Thousands is a game with a simple goal : destroy one thousand enemies as fast as possible. Along your way, you'll cross multiple worlds, leap across beautifully minimal landscapes, and chase kill streak records.

The HTML5 demo above showcases a limited version of just 1 world of the game. 

The full game brings you multiple worlds to explore and additional weapons at your disposal. 

Download today for a single dollar.

A game by Caleb Winston
